channel.title: Help me with trade please [317]
channel.description:
hello. in my server, when i click decline on trade, i get dc [connecting lost] can you guys please tell me how to fix it? [pwnscape server]
with thanks, frozenlord.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 18, 2009, 12:10:35 am[/size][hr]please help? its passed 6 pages.. please help! :(
